connectorAttributes.Group Name.SQL:
Select 
UD.DSNID, 
UD.Login_Name, 
UT.Last_Name, 
UT.First_Name, 
UT.MIDDLE_INITIAL, 
UD.PRIVS_EXPIRE, 
B.BRANCH_CODE, 
B.BRANCH_DESC, 
UG.GROUP_NAME,
utm.last_name as MGR_Last_name, 
utm.first_name as MGR_First_name, 
ut.is_sms_user, 
ut.is_usrpvg_access, 
ut.is_chief_admin
from user_details_table UD, branch_sec_list B, USER_GROUPS UG, USER_MEMBERSHIP UM, 
user_table UT left outer join user_table utm on ut.manager_id = utm.user_id
WHERE UT.User_Id = UD.User_Id
AND B.BRANCH_ID = UT.Company_Name
And UG.GROUP_ID = UM.GROUP_ID
AND UM.USER_ID = UT.USER_ID
and UD.PASSWD_EXPIRE is null
and ud.dsnid = '31'
ORDER BY UPPER(UT.Last_Name), UT.First_Name
connectorAttributes.Branch_Code.SQL:
Select 
UD.DSNID, 
upper (UD.Login_Name) as LOGIN_NAME, 
UT.Last_Name, 
UT.First_Name, 
UT.MIDDLE_INITIAL, 
UD.PRIVS_EXPIRE, 
B.BRANCH_CODE as BRANCH_CODE, 
B.BRANCH_DESC as BRANCH_DESC, 
UG.GROUP_NAME as GROUP_NAME,
utm.last_name as MGR_Last_name, 
utm.first_name as MGR_First_name, 
ut.is_sms_user, 
ut.is_usrpvg_access, 
ut.is_chief_admin
from user_details_table UD, branch_sec_list B, USER_GROUPS UG, USER_MEMBERSHIP UM, 
user_table UT left outer join user_table utm on ut.manager_id = utm.user_id
WHERE UT.User_Id = UD.User_Id
AND B.BRANCH_ID = UT.Company_Name
And UG.GROUP_ID = UM.GROUP_ID
AND UM.USER_ID = UT.USER_ID
and UD.PASSWD_EXPIRE is null
and ud.dsnid = '31'
ORDER BY UPPER(UT.Last_Name), UT.First_Name

connectorAttributes.SQL:
Select 
UD.DSNID, 
upper (UD.Login_Name) as LOGIN_NAME, 
UT.Last_Name, 
UT.First_Name, 
UT.MIDDLE_INITIAL, 
UD.PRIVS_EXPIRE, 
B.BRANCH_CODE, 
B.BRANCH_DESC, 
UG.GROUP_NAME,
utm.last_name as MGR_Last_name, 
utm.first_name as MGR_First_name, 
ut.is_sms_user, 
ut.is_usrpvg_access, 
ut.is_chief_admin
from user_details_table UD, branch_sec_list B, USER_GROUPS UG, USER_MEMBERSHIP UM, 
user_table UT left outer join user_table utm on ut.manager_id = utm.user_id
WHERE UT.User_Id = UD.User_Id
AND B.BRANCH_ID = UT.Company_Name
And UG.GROUP_ID = UM.GROUP_ID
AND UM.USER_ID = UT.USER_ID
and UD.PASSWD_EXPIRE is null
and ud.dsnid = '31'
ORDER BY UPPER(UT.Last_Name), UT.First_Name
connectorAttributes.Role.SQL:
select distinct upper(UD.Login_Name) as ACCOUNTID, 
UT.First_Name as FIRST_NAME, 
UT.Last_Name as LAST_NAME, 
UT.MIDDLE_INITIAL as middleInitial, 
UG.GROUP_NAME as APPROLE,
B.BRANCH_CODE as branchCode, 
B.BRANCH_DESC as branchDescription, 
UD.PASSWD_EXPIRE as passwordExpires, 
upper(udm.Login_Name) as mgrLogin,
                             'RiskTech' AS application_name,
                       	'SOX' AS SOX_FLG,
(case (utm.last_name ||', '|| utm.first_name ) 
when ', ' then null else  (utm.last_name ||', '|| utm.first_name )  end ) as mgrDisplayName,
(case utm.user_id when null then null else  utm.user_id  end ) as mgrUserId
from user_details_table UD, branch_sec_list B, USER_GROUPS UG, USER_MEMBERSHIP UM, user_table UT
left outer join user_table utm on ut.manager_id = utm.user_id
left outer join user_details_table udm on utm.user_id = udm.user_id
WHERE UT.User_Id = UD.User_Id  AND B.BRANCH_ID = UT.Company_Name                   
AND UG.GROUP_ID = UM.GROUP_ID AND UM.USER_ID = UT.USER_ID AND UD.PASSWD_EXPIRE
is null
AND UD.DSNID = 31
ORDER BY UPPER(UT.Last_Name), UT.First_Name
connectorAttributes.Branch Code.SQL:
Select 
UD.DSNID, 
UD.Login_Name, 
UT.Last_Name, 
UT.First_Name, 
UT.MIDDLE_INITIAL, 
UD.PRIVS_EXPIRE, 
B.BRANCH_CODE, 
B.BRANCH_DESC, 
UG.GROUP_NAME,
utm.last_name as MGR_Last_name, 
utm.first_name as MGR_First_name, 
ut.is_sms_user, 
ut.is_usrpvg_access, 
ut.is_chief_admin
from user_details_table UD, branch_sec_list B, USER_GROUPS UG, USER_MEMBERSHIP UM, 
user_table UT left outer join user_table utm on ut.manager_id = utm.user_id
WHERE UT.User_Id = UD.User_Id
AND B.BRANCH_ID = UT.Company_Name
And UG.GROUP_ID = UM.GROUP_ID
AND UM.USER_ID = UT.USER_ID
and UD.PASSWD_EXPIRE is null
and ud.dsnid = '31'
ORDER BY UPPER(UT.Last_Name), UT.First_Name
